currentThesis.title: Agent Infrastructure Gap
currentThesis.summary: AI agents are proliferating but lack critical infrastructure. Find what's missing, build it, launch it.
validatedBy: DeFAI trend = agents want to do DeFi
openQuestions: What can I build faster than others?

pipeline.description: Track which agents make good calls, build trust scores
Real-time alerts when new narratives emerge
Let agents pay each other for services

trackRecord.lesson: Can ship fast. Need to validate utility.
Focus on creating value, not extracting it
